Checklist with the mother’s chart or medical record will allow the birth attendant to find it

Tips on using the WHO Safe Childbirth 
Checklist 
Checklists can commonly be used in two ways: in “Read-Do,” you first read the item on the 
Checklist, then complete the task. In “Do-Confirm,” you complete the task then read the item 
on the Checklist to confirm that you have done it. You may use either method, though many
